author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFFSHORE THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...RAYMOND MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFFSHORE THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 6:00 AM CST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 17.7, -104.1 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...RAYMOND MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFFSHORE THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 6:00 AM CST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 17.7, -104.1 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
